Author: im__a__mess
Text: I'm so sorry hun. You are incredibly strong to be able to endure this illness, it really is a punish in every aspect of life. Please, please if you feel comfortable enough to reach out to anyone in your life to share that you're not doing so great, it honestly makes such a difference. I know it's scary, but death is much scarier and far more final. I believe you got this. You don't have to feel so alone ‚ù§
